attributes.action: return Mr Jay Roberts, as manager of Barlows JFC U9's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following 2 seasons of negative and unconstructive stagnation, we wish Mr Jay Roberts to return as team manager of Barlows JFC U9's.
We want to bring back attractive, free flowing football to our team, built on positive leadership, positive direction, skill development, childrens enjoyment and transparancy.
Join with us to make this team great again!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
